ingredients: Vegetables: pumpkin, zucchini, carrot, potato, garlic
instructions: Place all the ingredients in a pot and add salt.
Cook and bring to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for about half an hour.
notes: Brodo is a traditional Tunisian-Djerban Jewish dish, often enjoyed as a comforting soup. It can be served as a starter or a main dish, depending on preference.
